publication.title: A Security Architecture for Electronic Commerce Applications
publication.authors: bart de win,frank matthijs,bart de decker,wouter joosen
publication.abstract: On the Internet many electronic commerce applications can be used today, butmost of them provide only weak security or even none whatsoever. A majorcause of this problem is the variety of technologies used to create suchapplications. Most existing security architectures are not designed to work indifferent environments.
